content: cluster stripe beanie by you ve been yarned materials worsted weight yarn pictured above lion brand yarn wool ease in the color arrowwood 5mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors faux fur pom pom abbreviations chain- chain space- space round- round st- stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet single_crochet- single_crochet cluster st- cluster stitch slip_stitch- slip_stitch sts- stitches skip- skip decrease- decrease notes chain 2 is not counted as a stitch cluster stitch the cluster stitch is worked like a double_crochet decrease all in one stitch yo and place your hook into the next st yo pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yo and pull through 2 loops on the hook yo and place hook into same st yo pull up a loop 4 loops on your hook yo pull through 2 loops on hook yo pull through last three loops on hook the band of the hat is worked in row you will chain and turn at the end of each row once the band is finished you will then begin working in rounds for the body of the hat for the band you will work in the back loops of the half_double_crochet stitch and for the body you will work in the 3rd loop the 3rd loop is just behind and slightly below the back loop working into the 3rd loop creates a more pronounced ridge and texture if you are unsure what the 3rd loop is youtube has helpful videos band chain 9 row 1 half_double_crochet in third chain from hook and in each chain across chain 2 turn 7 sts row 2-40 half_double_crochet in the back loop of each st across 7 sts slip_stitch join the ends of the band together and turn right side out so the joined seam is on the inside body of the hat you will now start working in the round round 1 chain 1 2 single_crochet at the end of each row of the band join to first single_crochet 80 sts round 2 chain 2 *cluster st chain 1 skip 1 st* repeat from * join to chain 2 40 cluster sts round 3 chain 2 cluster st and chain 1 in each chain 1 space join to chain 2 40 cluster sts round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet into every chain 1 space and cluster st join to chain 2 80 sts round 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet into each st around join to chain 2 80 sts round 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet into the 3rd loop of each half_double_crochet this will make the first ribbed stripe join to chain 2 80 sts rnds 7-10 repeat rnds 5 and 6 two more times you should have 3 ribbed stripes rnds 11-12 repeat rnds 2 and 3 40 cluster sts you will now begin to decrease round 13 chain 2 half_double_crochet around skipping every 4th st/chain join to chain 2 60 sts round 14 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st around join to chain 2 60 sts round 15 chain 2 in 3rd loops
